name: thomsonlocal.com
overview:
thomsonlocal.com has been operating for 30 years, helping people find local businesses, no matter how they look for one.

Today, business listings are available both in print and online following the launch of its local search website, www.thomsonlocal.com in 2003. In October 2010, thomsonlocal.com released its first mobile application for iPhone allowing users to search for local businesses whilst on the move. This was followed by mobile apps for Android and Nokia in 2011.

thomsonlocal.com is powered by a comprehensive database with over 1.8 million businesses listed plus additional content such as user reviews and ratings.

thomsonlocal.com is a Google Premier SME Partner and the first Authorised Bing reseller in the UK.

The thomsonlocal.com directory is produced and delivered free of charge to over 22 million homes and businesses throughout the UK.

With its head office in Farnborough, Hampshire, thomsonlocal.com is an Investors in People Champion - Bronze, with regional sales offices across the UK.
